text: Hagi maka noti kazigati kva vahe'mo'zane Saidoni vahe'mo'zanena kora vahera zamazeri koro hu'naza vaheki'za, bainati kazinteti zamahe frizage'za anampina asezmante'naze. Na'ankure zamagra hihamu zaminuti vahera zamazeri koro hu'nazankiza, zamagazegu nehu'za fri'za zamagoza ano taga osu vahe'ma fri'za umani'nazafi umani'naze.
